abstract: Northern Rock, one of Britain’s biggest casualties of the credit crisis, sold part of its mortgage portfolio to JPMorgan as it seeks to repay about £25 billion, or $49 billion, in emergency financing.
snippet: Northern Rock, one of Britain’s biggest casualties of the credit crisis, sold part of its mortgage portfolio to JPMorgan as it seeks to repay about £25 billion, or $49 billion, in emergency financing.
lead_paragraph: LONDON  Northern Rock, one of Britain’s biggest casualties of the credit crisis, sold part of its mortgage portfolio on Friday to JPMorgan Chase as it seeks to repay about £25 billion, or $49 billion, in emergency financing.

abstract: The decline in leveraged buyouts is slashing fees for investment banks, including Deutsche Bank and JPMorgan Chase, by about 50 percent, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: The decline in leveraged buyouts is slashing fees for investment banks, including Deutsche Bank and JPMorgan Chase, by about 50 percent, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Buyout Bust Cuts Into Fees to Banks, Report Finds

abstract: Britain’s troubled Northern Rock has sold a 2.2 billion pound ($4.3 billion) portfolio of mortgages to JPMorgan Chase, a first step to help the troubled lender repay loans from the Bank of England, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Britain’s troubled Northern Rock has sold a 2.2 billion pound ($4.3 billion) portfolio of mortgages to JPMorgan Chase, a first step to help the troubled lender repay loans from the Bank of England, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Northern Rock to Sell Portfolio to JPMorgan

abstract: Charlie Gasparino of CNBC discusses talk of a link-up between JPMorgan and Washington Mutual.
snippet: Charlie Gasparino of CNBC discusses talk of a link-up between JPMorgan and Washington Mutual.
lead_paragraph: Charlie Gasparino of CNBC discusses talk of a link-up between JPMorgan and Washington Mutual.
